オプション1: "Hey. How are you feeling?"
No good... I’ve got a fever, and the pain... I can’t do anything..."
Seeing Trapezoid Man’s pained expression, Star Man furrowed his brow.
"There’s something I want to talk about. I’ll go get the kids?wait here."
"Yeah, got it."

"Today, I met a native who's still alive.
Apparently, if I manage to leave this island within a year, I can be saved."
"Huh? Wait, really? That’s great news!"
"Thanks. I want to try even harder now to escape within a year."
Trapezoid Man and the others nodded.

"The native I met today was an old woman...
According to her, everyone who used to live here made contracts with the demon—and they were all wiped out."

"Also, the monsters on this island are apparently bioweapons.
They’ve inherited traits from plants, so they can survive without eating or drinking."
"Ahh, that makes sense now."
"And also, when I was searching the coastline for islands today, I realized something..."

"Since Planet Poweregg is round,
I think we might be able to spot more distant islands from higher up in the mountains.
Tomorrow, I’m planning to head for the summit."
"Yeah, I guess that’s true. I didn’t notice it until you mentioned it."
"Did she say anything about that strange white person?"
Rectangle Man asked.
"...Ah, sorry. I didn’t ask that.
If I get to see her again, I’ll ask."
Star Man decided to head back to the shrine tomorrow.
